Uses of Class
chess.Color

Packages that use Color
Package Description
chess
This package corresponds to the chess layer.
chess.pieces
the package chess.pieces will contain the classes that will represent each type of chess piece.

  • Uses of Color in chess.pieces

    Constructors in chess.pieces with parameters of type Color
    Constructor Description
    Bishop​(Board board, Color color)
    creates the bishop chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color
    King​(Board board, Color color, ChessMatch chessMatch)
    creates the king chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color besides having an dependency with a chess match

    creates the knight chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color

    creates the queen chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color
